revised_title: The Toxicity and Physiological Effects of Betaine Extracted from Raw Beet-Sugar
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine the physiological effects of betaine, a substance found in beet-sugar. They discovered that betaine is toxic and can cause cardiac arrest in animals. The authors also found that commercial betaine is more potent than betaine extracted from beet-sugar. This research contradicts the previous belief that betaine is non-toxic.
